fullContent: Home› CookingCake ShopBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenYou have bought your first minivan to travel the world while selling cakes. Start baking, completing orders for your precious customers in the USA, and drive through the pyramids of Egypt and even Greenland with your cake shop. It's a true adventure where you discover new cake recipes!Cake Shop is a free cooking game where you manage your own bakery on wheels. Take orders and start making the dough!How to Play Cake ShopYou have just opened the bakery. Follow the instructions in the first level to acclimate yourself to controls and gameplay.After taking the very first order of your small business, get on stirring the dough. Add eggs, milk, sugar, baking powder, flour, a bit of salt and oil respectively. Pour into a springform pan and bake until golden brown in the oven.Decorate CakesIt's time to decorate the cake. Take a look at icings and sprinkles over dozens of alternatives. Choose between circle, heart and star-shaped cakes. Add vanilla, chocolate or strawberry icing on the cake. Add fruits and sprinkles according to the order.If you forget the customer's order, press the notebook icon on the top of your screen to view the order again.Decorate the cake as your customer wants and serve it to make them happier than ever.As you progress through levels, you can unlock new recipes with ice cream toppings and new fruits. You can even bake cupcakes. If you run out of ingredients such as milk or eggs, watch an ad or buy with your coins to fill your stocks.Game Features60 different levelsIncreasing difficulty of orders and number of customersHours of gameplayNew types of cakes in each unitNonviolent gameplay, safe and suitable for kids +3ControlsUse your mouse button to select ingredients.DeveloperFreezeNova created this game.Release DateJun 26, 2019What Is More?If you enjoy playing cake shop, try your hand at making ice slushies. Make delicious cold drinks with any flavor you'd like.
